seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' without 'Senior' designation, but requires 3+ years experience which aligns with mid-level for BI roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' and role focuses on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization using Cognos

sub_specialty.evidence: Role specifically focuses on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization using Cognos, with ETL tools for data integration

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports. Role focuses on individual contributor work: analysis, requirements, design, development, and testing

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms mentioned as preferred: AWS, Google, Azure with no clear primary preference indicated

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major cloud providers (AWS, Google, Azure) mentioned as nice-to-have skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on reporting and visualization suggests batch processing for scheduled reports, though ETL tools could support both batch and streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, Databricks workflows, etc.)

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data storage systems mentioned (warehouse, lake, lakehouse)

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite role specifically in Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra, India - requires local presence in this specific region

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra, India - focused on India timezone

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Navi Mumbai requires candidates to relocate to or already be in this specific location

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and role is in India which would require different visa types than H1B

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and role requires full-time onsite presence which may not align with student schedules

citizenship_required.evidence: Role in India would require work authorization in India, but no specific citizenship requirements mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time position at IBM Consulting suggests W2 employment structure, though not explicitly stated

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Cognos, UNIX) and nice-to-have skills (cloud platforms, ETL tools), balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined role focused specifically on BI/DW projects, reporting and visualization using Cognos - single clear focus

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for mid-level BI engineer: 3+ years, Cognos expertise, UNIX knowledge, with nice-to-have cloud/ETL skills
